definition: down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action
to arrange/to exhibit/to move to and fro/a pendulum

sentences.english: He tucked his shirt into his trousers.
sentences.chinese: 他把衬衫下摆塞入裤中。
齿痕，下摆是浓情蜜意女性化。

sentences.english: You can see the crotch on the left and the leg hem on the right.
sentences.chinese: 你可以看到在左边和右边的腿裆下摆。

sentences.english: Sewn scoop neckline, armholes and hem.
sentences.chinese: 舀缝制的领口，袖孔和下摆。

sentences.english: And the cuff and buttom of the jacket are also slim, no space. So jacket is easy to warm.
sentences.chinese: 另外袖口，下摆一般都是收身的，所以也不易漏风。

sentences.english: Drop tail hem with split side seams.
sentences.chinese: 拖放与尾部拆方接缝下摆。

sentences.english: His shirttail protruded from beneath his coat.
sentences.chinese: 他的衬衫下摆从外套下面露出来。

sentences.english: Add the specification that "Spirality after washing will not be tested on the rib and elastic lap."
sentences.chinese: 增加了罗纹和松紧下摆款式不考核水洗后扭曲度。

sentences.english: Bottom edge, with full-flavoured natural sexual freedom.
sentences.chinese: 下摆收口自然卷边，随性自由。

sentences.english: Hemlines of coats would be loosened while rank insignias would be moved from shoulders to collars.
sentences.chinese: 衣服下摆会变松，肩章会从肩部往衣领走位。

sentences.english: And the time is the shortest for cycloidal path when the object moves along the different curve lines.
sentences.chinese: 且得出不同曲线路径下摆线路径的运行时间最短。

sentences.english: Scalloped lace and a contrast ribbon enhance the hem.
sentences.chinese: 扇形花边和丝带对比下摆提高。

definition: collar/neckband/neckline/the place where the two ends of a collar meet
crew neck/round neck (of pull-over garment, e.g. T-shirt)
